message.content:
cs.MA, cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.DC, cs.DB

Reasoning: The paper discusses the implementation of digitalized word-of-mouth in pervasive computing systems, which involves distributed and embedded devices. This suggests that the paper may belong to the categories of Multi-Agent Systems (cs.MA), Information Retrieval (cs.IR), and Social and Information Networks (cs.SI). The paper also discusses the technical feasibility of the proposed method, which may suggest that it belongs to the categories of Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC) and Databases (cs.DB).
